item.title: Hi!
item.description: hello world! Link to heading Blogging functionality of this site is set and done thanks to hugo. All that’s left to do is some customizations and to clean up my portfolio layout and display them on a dedicated page. I might finish up customizing this theme first though before doing anything. Got a lot to customize. Here’s to the long road ahead of being a software engineer! üçª
